# Odyssey ![Odyssey Logo](reference/figures/logo_nobg.png)

Odyssey is an R shiny application for the exploration of Molecular
Biodiversity in Greece and Norway.

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [Usage](#usage)
- [Contributing](#contributing)
- [License](#license)
- [Related publications](#related_publications)

## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("BiodataAnalysisGroup/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey")
```

## Usage

``` r
# library(Odyssey)
Odyssey::run_odyssey()
```

## Contributing

If you would like to contribute to this pipeline, please see the
[Contribution
Guidelines](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/CONTRIBUTING.md).

## License

This work, as a whole, is licensed under the [MIT
license](https://github.com/npechl/MBioG/blob/main/LICENSE).

The code contained in this website is simultaneously available under the
MIT license; this means that you are free to use it in your own
packages, as long as you cite the source.

Please also refer to [CODE OF
CONDUCT](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md).

## Related_Publications

- N. Pechlivanis, A. Anastasiadou, A. Papageorgiou, E. Pafilis, and F.
  Psomopoulos, “Odyssey: an Interactive R Shiny App Approach to explore
  Molecular Biodiversity in Greece,” **23rd European Conference On
  Computational Biology (ECCB24)**, Sep. 2024, doi:
  [10.5281/ZENODO.14186452](https://zenodo.org/records/14186453).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`app_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/app_server.md)
  : Odyssey Shiny Application Server
- [`app_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/app_ui.md)
  : Odyssey Shiny Application UI
- [`data_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/data_server.md)
  : Server Module: ENA Query
- [`dataset_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/dataset_server.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Dataset Processing
- [`download_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/download_server.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Download Dataset
- [`fetch_ena_data()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/fetch_ena_data.md)
  : Helper function: ENA data retrieval
- [`fetch_gbif_data()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/fetch_gbif_data.md)
  : Helper function: GBIF data retrieval
- [`header_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/header_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Header
- [`home_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/home_server.md)
  : Server Module: Home Tab
- [`home_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/home_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Home tab
- [`info_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/info_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Display Instructions Pop up for the App
- [`map_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/map_server.md)
  : Server Module: Map tab
- [`map_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/map_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Map Tab
- [`overview_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/overview_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Overview Tab
- [`plot_server1()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/plot_server1.md)
  : Server Module: Overview Tab - Area Plot of Observations Over Time
- [`plot_server2()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/plot_server2.md)
  : Server Module: Overview Tab - Bar plot of Tax Divisions
- [`plot_server3()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/plot_server3.md)
  : Server Module: Overview Tab - Wordcloud of Scientific Names
- [`plot_server4()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/plot_server4.md)
  : Server Module: Overview Tab - Pie Chart with the Isolation Source
- [`run_odyssey()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/run_odyssey.md)
  : Run Odyssey Shiny Application
- [`source_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/source_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Sidebar - Source Selection
- [`table_options_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/table_options_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Sidebar - Table Options
- [`table_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/table_server.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Table Rendering
- [`table_ui()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/table_ui.md)
  : UI Module: Table Tab - Table Display
- [`text_server1()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/text_server1.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Row Count Display
- [`text_server2()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/text_server2.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Number of Unique Taxonomic Divisions
- [`text_server3()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/text_server3.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Number of Unique Scientific Names
- [`text_server4()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/text_server4.md)
  : Server Module: Table Tab - Number of Unique Isolation Sources
- [`tree_server()`](https://biodataanalysisgroup.github.io/ELIXIR-BFSP-Odyssey/reference/tree_server.md)
  : Overview Tab: Tree Chart of Taxonomic Hierarchy
